text: The 1240s BC is a decade which lasted from 1249 BC to 1240 BC. ==Events and trends== * c. 1240 BC—The Philistines expand their influence into Cyprus and Canaan. * c. 1240 BC—The wimble and lathe are invented. ==In legend== * 1249 BC—Gideon conquers the Midianites. * c. 1240 BC—The Argonauts capture Troy. ==References== es:Años 1240 a. C. Joshua 6-22
title: 1240s BC
